channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 马丁-格林菲尔德（Martin Greenfield）于周三去世，他在大屠杀中幸存下来，后来为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）、勒布朗-詹姆斯（LeBron James）和巴拉克-奥巴马（Barack Obama）设计服装。他是美国制造业为何重要的非官方发言人。
item.description:
Martin Greenfield, who died Wednesday, survived the Holocaust and went on to dress Donald Trump, LeBron James and Barack Obama. He was an unofficial spokesman for why American manufacturing matters. https://t.co/xFx3Uvfz7v https://t.co/xFx3Uvfz7v

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 街谈巷议：金融业试图通过 ESG 同时满足官员、道德任务和主题投资者的需求。@jonsindreu 认为，金融业试图同时满足官员、道德任务和主题投资者的需求，但最终却没有为他们中的任何一方提供良好的服务。
item.description:
Heard on the Street: With ESG, the financial industry tried to cater to officials, ethical mandates and thematic investors all at once. It has ended up serving none of them well, argues @jonsindreu. https://t.co/oN8CiMK6Ur https://t.co/oN8CiMK6Ur

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 中国对这个曾经充满活力的城市的控制日益加强，香港社会的任何角落都无法幸免。"当潜规则、不成文的规定越来越多时，人们感到迷茫，只能眼睁睁地看着，默默地接受"。
item.description:
No corner of Hong Kong’s society has been left untouched by China’s tightening grip on the once-vibrant city. “When there are more and more unspoken, unwritten rules, people feel lost and can only watch and silently accept.” https://t.co/xgiMrXGjpU https://t.co/xgiMrXGjpU

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 作为全球最重要的金融市场，美国国债正在飞速增长--这让一些华尔街人士感到不安
item.description:

item.title: Kaia Gerber 深知作为 nepo 宝宝的好处。"她说："我个人非常清楚这对我的好处，我绝不会说任何负面的话。
item.description:
Kaia Gerber is aware of the benefits of being a nepo baby. “I personally am very aware of all the wonderful things it has done for me, and I would never ever say anything negative about it,” she says. https://t.co/hiGkgafZuH https://t.co/hiGkgafZuH

item.title: 基辅在空中和海上部署了无人机，取得了致命的效果。现在，它计划在地面上重复这一战略。但这一举措并非没有挑战。

item.title: 你的结婚对象往往会改变你与金钱的关系：研究人员说，随着时间的推移，夫妻在支出、储蓄和风险方面的做法往往会越来越相似

item.title: 乔纳森-普莱斯是《三体》的主演，他说罗伯特-德尼罗帮助他在电影《巴西》中获得了一个角色。"事实证明，德尼罗给我留下了深刻印象。"《巴西》成为了一部热门影片，也是一部改变我职业生涯的影片"。
item.description:
Jonathan Pryce, who stars in "3 Body Problem," says Robert De Niro helped him land a part in the movie "Brazil." "De Niro, it turned out, was impressed. 'Brazil' became a cult hit and a career-shifting film for me." https://t.co/iISN6iNWN6 https://t.co/iISN6iNWN6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 一个多世纪以来，社会一直认为反社会病症是不可治疗和不可救赎的。经过多年的研究和深入治疗，我可以说反社会者并不 "坏"、"邪恶 "或 "疯狂"。我们的行为是为了填补空虚，帕特里克-加涅写道。
item.description:
For more than a century, society has deemed sociopathy untreatable and unredeemable. After years of study and intensive therapy, I can say that sociopaths aren’t “bad” or “evil” or “crazy.” We act out to fill a void, writes Patric Gagne. https://t.co/qqTdmp2AZU pic.twitter.com/mgBeCizWp3

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 发短讯并不一定要X级。与伴侣谈谈什么感觉舒服，给自己一些时间去适应。
item.description:

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 24, 2024

item.title: 超级名模吉赛尔-邦辰（Gisele Bündchen）几乎每天都坚持锻炼，并保持简单的饮食习惯。"她说："我的全部目标就是尽我所能活得最长，活得最好。
item.description:
Supermodel Gisele Bündchen exercises almost daily and keeps her diet simple. “My whole goal is to live the longest I can living the best life that I can,” she said. https://t.co/WN8yJus1G7 https://t.co/WN8yJus1G7
